name: Bone Chill
description: Assail a creature with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic damage and cannot regain Hit Points. Undead creatures also get Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.
debuff: Target cannot regain Hit Points until the start of your next turn. If the target is Undead, it also has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.

name: Toll the Dead
description: Ring the bell of impending doom. If the target is at full health, you deal 1d12 Necrotic damage instead of 1d8.
damage: 1d8 Necrotic (or 1d12 if target is at full health)

name: False Life
description: Bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life to gain 7 temporary hit points.
buff: Caster gains 7 temporary hit points until Long Rest. When upcast, gain an additional 5 temporary hit points per spell slot level above 1st.

name: Inflict Wounds
description: Putrefy a creature with the necrotic energy filling your hands, dealing 3d10 Necrotic damage.

name: Ray of Sickness
description: Call forth a ray of sickening energy that deals 2d8 Poison damage and possibly Poisons the target.
debuff: Target may become Poisoned for 2 turns, suffering Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Ability Checks.

name: Blindness
description: Magically blind an enemy creature, limiting its sight range. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage and the foe attacks with Disadvantage.
debuff: Target is Blinded for 10 turns. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage, and its attacks have Disadvantage.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
description: A beam of enervating energy springs from your fingers to weaken a foe. The target deals half damage with Weapon Attacks using Strength.
debuff: Target deals half damage with Strength-based weapon attacks for 10 turns. Requires Concentration.

name: Animate Dead
description: Create an undead servant from a corpse. The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.
buff: Summons a zombie or skeleton minion that fights for you. When upcast at Level 4, creates 3 minions. At Level 5, creates a Ghoul. At Level 6, creates 3 Ghouls or Flying Ghouls.

name: Bestow Curse
description: Curse a creature with your touch. The curse either bestows Disadvantage on checks and Saving Throws or attacks, lets you deal additional damage to the target, or robs it of its actions.
damage: If using damage option: +1d8 Necrotic per attack
debuff: Choose one curse effect for 10 turns: Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws; Disadvantage on Attack Rolls; target must make WIS save each turn or lose its action; or your attacks deal an extra 1d8 Necrotic damage. Requires Concentration. When upcast to Level 4 or 5, duration extends and Concentration not required.

name: Feign Death
description: Put an ally in a protective, magical coma deep enough to imitate death. The ally becomes Resistant to all damage except psychic damage, and disease and poison no longer have any effect.
buff: Target ally becomes immune to poison and disease, gains Resistance to all damage except Psychic, and appears dead for 10 turns.

name: Revivify
description: Revive a companion. They return to life with 1 hit point. Can only target a companion character who is dead.
buff: Revives a dead companion with 1 HP.

name: Speak with Dead
description: Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions. Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell.
buff: Allows caster to question a corpse for information.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: Touch an enemy to siphon their life force. You regain half as many hit points as the damage they take. For 10 turns, you can use Vampiric Touch again without expending an additional spell slot.
buff: Caster regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

name: Blight
description: Plants are more susceptible to this spell: they roll with Disadvantage, and still take half of all the damage if they succeed the roll. Deals 8d8 Necrotic damage.
debuff: Plants have Disadvantage on their Saving Throw against this spell.

name: Contagion
description: Poison a target and possibly afflict them with a disease of your choice. The disease effects vary based on which ability score is targeted.
debuff: Target becomes diseased for 10 turns. Options include: Blinding Sickness (Blinded, WIS Disadvantage); Filth Fever (Exhausted, STR Disadvantage); Flesh Rot (Vulnerability to all damage, CHA Disadvantage); Mindfire (Confused, INT Disadvantage); Red Ache (Reduced movement, DEX Disadvantage); Shakes (Stunned when hit, CON Disadvantage).

name: Circle of Death
description: Sculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures with 8d6 Necrotic damage.

name: Create Undead
description: Raise a corpse as a heinous mummy that fights by your side until Long Rest. The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.
buff: Summons a powerful mummy minion that fights for you until Long Rest.

name: Eyebite
description: Your eyes become black corridors walled in teeth, your gaze capable of inflicting dread, sickness, or putting creatures to sleep. While Concentrating, you may cast Eyebite without expending a spell slot.
debuff: Choose one effect per turn for 100 turns: Asleep (target falls unconscious); Panicked (target is Frightened); Sickened (target has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Ability Checks). Requires Concentration.

name: Harm
description: Reduce a target's maximum hit points by 14d6, but never below 1. On a successful save, the target still takes half damage.
debuff: Target's maximum HP is reduced by the damage taken until Long Rest (cannot go below 1 HP).

name: Danse Macabre
description: Summon 4 ghouls that fight by your side. Obtained by deciphering the Necromancy of Thay.
buff: Summons 4 ghoul minions that can Paralyze enemies.
debuff: Ghoul attacks may Paralyze targets (CON Save).

name: Dethrone
description: Shred a foe's very essence by pulling on strands of the Weave, dealing 10d6+20 Necrotic damage.
